title: How can we get the second chroma for victorious Orianna?
body: There is no ranked twisted treeline that I can play, there is just flex and soloqueue. They said we need 3 gold+ ranks to get both chroma though, so are we just gonna get shafted and be unable to get it?

replies.body:
Ranked TT runs only *part time* on the OCE server, due to the "small" population of the server and how practical that makes it to run. As per the [Queue Schedule announcement](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/OYQ9dMpV-queue-schedule-updated-oct-15-2018), Ranked TT is available at the following times:

> **Twisted Treeline Ranked Flex:**
> *Thursday^^: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
> Friday^^: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT*
> Saturday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
> Sunday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
> 
> *^^ additional days running up until end of season on Nov 12, 2018*
Ok cool thanks, ill just play it a bit in the evening over the next month and get gold.
